name: Cheesy Run
description:
Cheesy Run is a fun and exciting running game. In this game you're a mouse whose in the run 

after stealing cheese from the cat. Jump over the cactus and mouse traps. If you ever get caught by it, 

you'll have to choose your faith. You'll choose from three chests and only one of it has a bonus points so 

choose wisely. Play the game now and see how far can you go!
